name: Bad Grandma
description:
Bad Grandma is a 3rd Person Shooter about a sweet little grandma stuck in a dream where she has to defend against hordes of kittens with Slippers! Grab the batteries and put them in the remote to turn off the TV and end the Fever Dream to escape!

This was done for a 2.5 day game jam put on by VFS for students and staff!

Credits Ava Cheng | https://avachengg.itch.io/

And A special thanks to everyone in the October 2022 VFS Game Jam!
